    • readKeyFile

      public static LinkedHashMap<String,String> readKeyFile(String filename, List<String> contigIds, String refqry, MapOpticsModel model)
      Read and parse file containing keys
      Parameters:
      filename - path of the key file
      contigIds - list of contigs IDs
      refqry - string indicating if a reference or a query is used
      model - model containing query and reference data
      Returns:
      hashmap of keys the key is the name of the key (second column in key file), the value is its ID (first column of the file)
